connect-level.description: A `connect` / `express` session store backed by LevelDB via [levelup].

Hadron.description: A hackable publishing platform using LevelDB as main database.

Groove Basin.description: Music player server with a web-based user interface. Uses [levelup] for the music library database.

Prerender-level-cache.description: [Prerender](https://github.com/prerender/prerender) plugin to use level as a cache store.

tsd.description: Spin up a quick server to visualize time series data.

appfeed.description: Version feed for trusted application delivery

arrivals-osx.description: Watch a folder for audio and video arrivals and convert them to Apple-friendly formats.

bleach-log-server.description: Keep track of bleach levels for a hot tub or a pool.

browserify-cdn.description: Browserify CDN. Caches browserify bundles in LevelDB.
